page.title: 07 My Normal Downpatrick Day
page.content: I begin my morning very sleepily at 7.45.I get up,put on my school uniform and have breakfast.I leave the house at 8.20 with my father,brother and sister in the car. I arrive in school at 8.30 and play football to 9.15 when school starts.I get a break at 10.40 to 11.00.I work for another hour. Then we get lunch break from 12.00 to 1.00. We eat our lunch,play football and talk. I am dismissed at 3.00 and my mother collects me.When I get home I go outside and play football or cycle on my B.M.X.After tea at 6.30 I watch television or go outside to play. I go to bed at 9.30 and read a book or listen to the radio.At 10.30 my dad comes in and switches off the light. Michael Mc Kenny,age 11.
